pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Everyday Conditioner 250ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Everyday Conditioner softens and detangles hair.

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Conditioner combines Tea Tree Oil with gentle conditioners to soften and detangle hair after shampooing. Ideal for frequently washed hair. For best results use Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Shampoo prior to conditioning.

Product Claims: Product not tested on animals.

Size: 250mL

Hair Type: All.

KEY FEATURES

• Ideal for frequently washed hair.
• Gentle condition to soften and de-tangle hair after shampooing

Warnings

For external use only. It is recommended you skin
patch test prior to use. Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs.
Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out
of reach of children.

Ingredients

Water, Cetearyl Alcohol, Distearoylethyl Hydroxyethylmonium Methosulfate, Lauryl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexyl Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Fragrance, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Citric Acid.

Directions

After using Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Shampoo, rinse well. Gently massage a sufficient amount of Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Conditioner through the hair and scalp. Leave 1-2 minutes. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
